text: India participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The Indian squad comprised 32 athletes competing in 13 sports: aquatics (swimming), archery, athletics, badminton, basketball, boxing, judo, rowing, shooting, table tennis, tennis, weightlifting and wrestling. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- !
